author: cnbc.com
title: PCM: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
EL SEGUNDO, Calif. (AP) _ PCM Inc. (PCMI) on Wednesday reported first-quarter net income of $2.8 million.
On a per-share basis, the El Segundo, California-based company said it had profit of 23 cents. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were 34 cents per share.
The technology and consumer electronics company posted revenue of $542.8 million in the period.
PCM shares have climbed roughly 7 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, shares hit $10.55, a decline of 65 percent in the last 12 months.
